app_info: This application allows earthquake victims in need to add their needs and contact information; it was designed to meet the needs by listing the requests.
error_ocured_when_page_loading: An error occured while the page was loading.
please_make_sure_give_your_localization_: Please make sure to grant location access permission.
make_sure_you_are_permisson_granted:
This platform works using your location data.
Please make sure to activate the location service on your device.
make_sure_permission_granted_with_instru: Make sure you've allowed access to location services on your device. You can follow the instructions below to grant the location permission.
make_sure_permission_granted_on_browser: If you have location service turned on over your device, make sure you allow access to location services in your browser. You can follow the instructions below to grant the location permission.
ended_demand_dialog_subtitle: Are you sure you want to end your request?
be_careful_with_the_information_you_prov: You can contact the person in need using the buttons below. The identity of this person has not been verified by us. Please be careful.
please_prefer_sms_or_whatsapp:
Due to the density of GSM operators
we kindly ask you to use SMS instead of calling.
can_not_find_result_try_clearing_filters: No results found, try cleaning the filters
no_demand_yet:
There are currently no requests for support.
If you have a request for support, you can create a request from the support request menu.
can_you_write_what_you_need: Can you write what you need?.
you_can_only_select_10_categories: You can select up to 10 categories.
new_demand_information: The support request to be created only creates a request for your location. In order for us to reach those who need support quickly, please do not create a request if you are not in the disaster area.
kvkk_info: I've read the <link>KVKK Consent Text</link> and I accept the terms.
kvkk_text: This application was created by volunteers working in the field of information technologies in order to collect search and rescue efforts and help and support requests in a common database in the great earthquake disaster that occurred in Turkey on February 6, 2023, and transfer them to authorized institutions and organizations. The personal data of the people you specify in need of help or support will be processed automatically, based on the legal reason ’’it is compulsory for the protection of the life or bodily integrity of the person or someone else, who is unable to express his or her consent due to actual impossibility or whose consent is not legally valid’’. Personal data belonging to you will be processed based on the legal reason ’’data processing is mandatory for the establishment, exercise or protection of a right’’. Personal data such as name, surname, telephone and address included in the assistance and support requests you will share will be collected in the database created by us and whose servers are located in Turkey and abroad. and for the purpose of processing personal data. I accept and declare that I will notify changes and updates.
you_can_write_up_to_1000_characters: You can write up to 1000 characters.
